text: @LotusEnergizers nah, I'm not in orlando. Just keeping my eye on it remotely, someone has to keep the wheels of industry turning. #ls10
A new Redbook for building Domino Web Apps using 8.5.1 http://tinyurl.com/y8fjzts #in #ls10
biggest corporate cloud deployment to-date of email is on Lotus. http://bit.ly/5XgFOP. No doubt more to come from #LS10. #in
@martybucko I'm assuming you are you off to #ls10 then...
passed the IBM WebSphere Process Server v6.1, System Admin exam.
Starting works after a few rights and a perfect left at freshy. Now that everyone is back to work, sun is out and the waves have improved!
Is back at my desk for the first work day of the new year and ready for 2010.
last surf of the year at freshy, more wet than memorable. freshy surf bar will be open on NY day for all the coffee addicts.
cracking back into work after an early morning fun surf at North Steyne.
WebSphere Portal release management. http://bit.ly/6rfal4. Something that I'm very keen on (and not just for portal either).
Likes hearing that we're not wasting our time after all. I guess I'll be pretty busy come the new year. #in
Cruising to work on the 7:45
Is wondering if Windows 7 calculates file copying time correctly.Curse you XP, its been saying '37 Minutes remaining' for the last 20!
Todays lesson. Toyota security keys aren't completely waterproof. 2 years of ocean abuse the security chip errodes, car won't start. doh!
reading http://clientsfromhell.tumblr.com/, these are too silly to be made up. They must be true. Amusing.
Interesting presentation from the LWCM team about agile at the rational user group meetup.
Cirrus Australia ranked #6 in CRN Fast 50.http://bit.ly/7vzjF0
my PDF library is mentioned on #1 notes & domino blog, codestore, again http://bit.ly/8XSqtD
Upgraded to ND 8.5.1 client - overlaying home calendar & work, on both the iPhone and Laptop. I can schedule with confidence :-)
I'm ready for the heatwave - WFH in boardies
herding cat....literally, and it's no help when you are on a deadline.
@martybucko I'm wise in the ways of the bucko. ;-)
Tired but not hungover, and got home safely last night, after the launch party.
getting live. Lotus Live and thinking I need a new profile picture. The wedding snap is too fresh faced.
back from the collaboration nation lunch, great seeing familiar faces there
reading about http://www.manlyfestivalofsurfing.com.au/
@gdruce omnifocus gtd for iPhone/mac
Starting the week on a high, even if it is a late night getting home.
@gdruce dunno, there is a lot of free apps for the iPhone. Maybe not open source but not entirely locked into only appleware :-))
Cruising home on the ferry. Trying not to think of tomorrows early start.
@gdruce no notes, php and zend. You're not going all open source are you ?
Day trip to Melbourne to see clients.
C'mon Manly. Let's go!!!
Is liking the coastalwatch iPhone app. It  is really great to see the waves I am missing out on!
Nanny is sick, providing air cover!
Watching Chloes hair going static on the trampoline. She is chasing the boys and zapping them - fun for all.
First sports carnival today. Looks like it will be wet and muddy!
Working from the moody chef this AM
100% in WAS ND v6.1 core admin. Bleeding purple and yellow!
Cheese n pickle sambo, tasty jacks BBQ flavour, timeout and a cuppa. Thinking about the LLL team!
having fun watching the new furry four legged additions to the family running around mad.
@stevebehr yes, but in Sydney. Didn't get leave pass approved on time & and also been working late recently.
Is having fish n' chips and quietly celebrating the lotus reunion
Is thinking perhaps I should backup my laptop.
Is enjoying a fine glass of port, thanks stu bedding, just the tonic for an early start and late finish.
Curry with smithy
@stevebehr still better than being behind a desk! Glass half full and all.
Recovering after Chloes birthday.
Passed IBM software top gun and I am all fired up.
@stevebehr that's better.
@stevebehr - 2 foot clean waves....better than nothing
get in! Go the blues 28-16
Home made chook soup. Is there anything better to get you back on the mend !
iPhone plus fuel tv podcast is a rocking combo
WFH, thinking of wandering down to the village to get a coffee.
Is packing up and leaving the old office after helping set up a b2b vpn - hopefully back in time to see the game...
ended up at curly, surf was better than I expected, bonus
off for a surf with a buddy...hopefully. Conditions are small, so the log will be the best option. Still its good to get in the water
Took the M142 test - 84.21% - now I'm certified Lotus Solutions Sales.
WFH, surf is o/head and closing out at freshy. Too much for an old unfit fella like me.
had enough of the sales mastery preso's, time for a cup of tea and to switch to some PHP and MySql development.
Hazels back. Managed OK at the weekend (4.3/5). Everyone got fed, to their sports on time, laundry done and picked up Hazel at the airport
WFH, watching M142 preso and getting ahead on some weekend domestic chores
getting through the dvd backlog and setting up twitter -> facebook
